name: google-calendar
title: Google Calendar
description: Manage your Google calendar easily. Create events, search contacts, and check out your upcoming schedule.
author: thomas

commands.name: create-event
commands.title: Create Event
commands.subtitle: Google Calendar
commands.description: Creates an event in your Google Calendar

preferences.name: addSignature
preferences.title: Advanced
preferences.label: Add Signature
preferences.description: Add a signature that the event was created using Raycast to the description of the event

commands.name: list-events
commands.title: List Events
commands.description: View your upcoming Google Calendar events
commands.subtitle: Google Calendar

commands.name: menu-bar
commands.title: Menu Bar
commands.description: Show next meeting in menu bar
commands.subtitle: Google Calendar

tools.name: create-event
tools.title: Create Event
tools.description: Creates a new event in the user's Google Calendar

tools.name: delete-event
tools.title: Delete Event
tools.description: Deletes an event from the user's Google Calendar

tools.name: edit-event
tools.title: Edit Event
tools.description: Edits an existing event in the user's Google Calendar

tools.name: search-events
tools.title: Search Events
tools.description: Searches events from the user's Google Calendar

tools.name: check-availability
tools.title: Check Availability
tools.description: Checks the availability of potential attendees for a given time period

tools.name: get-current-user
tools.title: Get Current User
tools.description: Returns information about the currently authenticated user

tools.name: get-current-time
tools.title: Get Current Time
tools.description: Returns the current time of the user in the user's timezone

preferences.name: defaultEventDuration
preferences.title: Default Event Duration
preferences.description: The default duration for new events

preferences.name: showTimeUntilNext
preferences.title: Show Time Until Next Meeting
preferences.description: Display time remaining until the next meeting in the menu bar
preferences.label: Show time until next meeting

preferences.name: maxCharacters
preferences.title: Max Characters in Menu Bar
preferences.description: Maximum number of characters to display for the meeting title in the menu bar

preferences.name: refreshInterval
preferences.title: Refresh Interval (minutes)
preferences.description: How often to refresh the menu bar display (countdown updates automatically, this controls data refresh)

preferences.name: showOngoingMinutes
preferences.title: Show Ongoing Meetings (minutes)
preferences.description: How many minutes after a meeting starts to still show it in the menu bar

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
